thread.title: Clinton promotes gay rights as a main pillar of 2016 bid

title: Clinton promotes gay rights as a main pillar of 2016 bid
text:
> Top News Clinton promotes gay rights as a main pillar of 2016 bid Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton gestures as she speaks to the Human Rights Campaign in Washington, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015.
